text:
'Bachelor' couple Nick Viall, Vanessa Grimaldi end their engagement 'with lots of love'

Show Caption Hide Caption Bachelor Nick Viall proposes to... Nick Viall gets down on one knee, and sends one woman home... Time

Nick Viall and Vanessa Grimaldi are no longer set to walk down the aisle.

The two, who Bachelor Nation saw get engaged on The Bachelor finale in March, have decided to go their separate ways, Viall's rep Brooks Butterfield has confirmed.

"It's with a great amount of heartbreak for the both us as we have decided to end our engagement," Viall and Grimaldi shared in a joint statement. "We gave this relationship our all and we are saddened that we did not get the fairytale ending we hoped for. We will continue to be there for each other no matter what. This hasn't been an easy decision, however, as we part ways, we do so with lots of love and admiration for each other."

Viall last shared a photo of Grimaldi, a special education teacher, on his Instagram on July 26, to promote his partnership with Hello Fresh meal delivery service.

Grimaldi last shared an image of Viall on her Instagram as part of a Hello Fresh promotion on Aug. 15.

Viall previously attempted to find love on several ABC series, in addition to his stint as the most recent Bachelor. He's twice been a contestant on The Bachelorette and once on Bachelor in Paradise.
title: 'Bachelor' couple Nick Viall, Vanessa Grimaldi end their engagement 'with lots of love'

og.title: 'Bachelor' couple Nick Viall, Vanessa Grimaldi end their engagement 'with lots of love'
og.description: The couple who got engaged on the March finale of 'The Bachelor' have called it quits.
